posts.post_content: I love this card, my spirit deck is full of stuff that triggers when I play a spirit or arcane spell. and with this card I can fire those things at least once every turn. works well with stuff like [Briarknit Kami](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Briarknit Kami) and [Faithful Squire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faithful Squire) and many others.
posts.html:

Posted By: Gareth32 (5/14/2012 4:38:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
BLINKY!!!
  
   
I have always loved this card, and not just because it could be used as a nigh unkillable blocker.
  
   
A long time ago, I was in love with a girl, and through some convoluted interactions, she got the personal pet name "Glowworm" from me... And once, I spent the night at her place, and deep in the night, I could not sleep, and I had this card with me, and scanned it on her computer, and set it as her desktop background. She loved it. :)
posts.html:
BLINKY!!!

I have always loved this card, and not just because it could be used as a nigh unkillable blocker.

A long time ago, I was in love with a girl, and through some convoluted interactions, she got the personal pet name "Glowworm" from me... And once, I spent the night at her place, and deep in the night, I could not sleep, and I had this card with me, and scanned it on her computer, and set it as her desktop background. She loved it. :)
